 2019-06442019-06-02,  PMO,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of KEITH PETERSON of Cambridge Bay, Nunavut, to be a special adviser to the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, to serve as a member of the Interim Management Advisory Board for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months, on a part-time basis.
